title: PHPgetrandmax()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPgetrandmax()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Return largest possible random value that can be returned by rand():
<?php
echo(getrandmax());
?>

Definition and Usage
The getrandmax() function returns the largest possible value that can be 
returned by
rand()
.
Syntax
getrandmax();
Technical Details
Return Value:
The largest possible value returned by rand()
Return Type:
Integer
PHP Version:
4+

★
+1
